data.name: Legend of the Outlaw Mage: Bonus Content
data.detailed_description: Get a behind-the-scenes look at the art and development for The Legend of the Outlaw Mage in this interactive art book!
data.about_the_game: Get a behind-the-scenes look at the art and development for The Legend of the Outlaw Mage in this interactive art book!
data.short_description: Get a behind-the-scenes look at the art and development for The Legend of the Outlaw Mage in this interactive art book!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600K, AMD 1600X or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 770; AMD Radeon 6950 HD; AMD Vega 8 IGP (Intel IGP not supported); 4GB VRAM or better
  • Additional Notes: Minimum average sustained frame rate of 30fps or better achieved on hardware combinations in this min-spec range. Your experience may vary based on a variety of factors.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-5930K or AMD 3600X or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 or better; AMD Radeon 580 or better; 4GB VRAM or better
  • Additional Notes: The game runs well on most common gaming configurations within the past 5-6 years (GTX 980-era and beyond).
